copyPreviousExpenseMessage: Would you like to start with a blank form or copy fields from your last expense?
addExpenseInstruction: Tap the + button to add a new expense
expenseNameInstruction: Enter a name for your expense
categoryInstruction: Select a category for your expense
failedToLoadPreviousExpense: Failed to load previous expense data
name: Name
instructionsContent:
1. Tap '+' to add a new expense
2. Tap an expense to view/edit details
3. Swipe left to delete an expense
4. Use the menu for more options
confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this expense?
noExpensesYet: No expenses yet. Tap + to add one.

customer.previous: Do you want to use previous data?

delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
no_events: No events found. Add a new event to get started.
help_message:
To add a new event, tap the plus button and fill all required fields.

To view event details, tap on an event from the list.

To update an event, view its details and edit the fields, then tap Update.

To delete an event, view its details and tap Delete.

You can copy information from your previous event by tapping "Copy from Previous" when adding a new event.
